definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: ( = asked (of ´[[י]]:), cf [[שְׁאַלְתִּיאֵל]] infr.; Palm. n.pr. [[שאילא]] Lzb:371 Cooke:283);—Saonl:

:397 1st king of Isr., 1Sa 9:2, 1Sa 9:3, 1Sa 9:3, 1Sa 9:5 (son of Kish, a Benjamite) + 359 t.Sm, 28 t. 1 Chr, Ps 18:1, Ps 52:2, Ps 54:2, Ps 57:1, Ps 59:1 (all in titles); ´[[גִּבְעַת שׁ]]: Is 10:29 (and 1Sa 11:4, 1Sa 15:34; 2Sa 21:6 v. II . [[גִּבְעָה]]). †
a son of Simeon Ge 46:10, Ex 6:15, Nu 26:13 (all P) = 1Ch 4:24. †
